member.name: M:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Core.Jobs.JobExtensions.SetupSplunk(IkeMtz.NRSRx.Core.Jobs.IJob,Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Sets up the asp.net core application to log to a Splunk instance using a Splunk Http Event Collector. Refernce: https://docs.splunk.com/Documentation/SplunkCloud/8.2.2106/Data/UsetheHTTPEventCollector Note: The following configuration variables are required: SPLUNK_HOST => The url of the splunk collector endpoint (ie: http(s)://{Splunk Host}/services/collector) SPLUNK_TOKEN => Security token
